short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BT Cloud Phone Meetings for Chrome OS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BT Cloud Phone Meetings for Chrome OS expands the power of HD video collaboration to Chrome OS devices. BT Cloud Phone Meetings for Chrome OS is an addition to BT Cloud Phone for G Suite integrations. 

Meet with participants with HD video and share your screen, important business documents or website with anyone, anywhere and at any time (number of participants depends on licence type of your Cloud Phone account).

BT Cloud Phone Meetings for Chrome OS is available for BT Cloud Phone customers using Chrome OS devices. BT Cloud Phone Meetings for Chrome OS is free for meeting participants, all they need is a meeting link. 

BT Cloud Phone Meetings for Chrome OS supports the following features: 

* HD Video: Meet with the highest quality video on Chrome OS-powered devices
* Screen Share: Share your screen and files with anyone, anytime
* Dial-In Conference Numbers for Audio: Join the meeting using a telephone dial-in number
* VOIP Audio: Use your computer audio to collaborate
* Host Controls: Hosts can invite participants, mute/unmute meeting attendees, lock the meeting, and remove participants.
* Integrated Chat: Anyone (both hosts and participants) can initiate chat with specific users or the entire group during meetings.
